content: the sweet tea shawl crochet pattern is a lovely lacy shawl that can also double as a scarf i used beautiful hand dyed sport weight gradient yarn from cornbread and honey but any lightweight yarn will work this pattern is also available to view for free on my blog or you can purchase the ad-free printable pdf here on ravelry **what s included ** 6 page printable pdf download written instructions for 54 triangle shawl crochet stitch chart link to video stitch tutorial **pattern difficulty ** easy **construction of garment ** shawl is worked flat **sizing & yardage ** 54 across the top finished and blocked 600-875 yards sport weight #2 yarn **yarn ** hobbii cotton kings sultan sport weight - #2 100% cotton 200g/875 yards all of my patterns are thoroughly tested and/or professionally tech edited all of my patterns are in us terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make ** love this pattern stay up to date on all things two brothers blankets including new patterns releases and fun events by subscribing to my newsletter 1 ** 1 https //www twobrothersblankets com/subscribe/
